text: @realDonaldTrump Such a stupid & desperate ad. Everybody knows that #Trump failed miserably with #COVID19. Then he turns around & attacks Social Media & issues an order over his own grievance. To top it all off, he makes a racist tweet which escalates all the protests. #GoJoe #Biden #Biden2020
